info.name: Book of the Fallen - Custom Feats
info.description: Contains Custom Feats created specifically for the campaign "Book of the Fallen".

description.p: Shadows now bow to your will, for the Shadowthrone mark is upon your soul. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You can use the Hide action in dim light or darkness.
Whenever you take the Hide action and successfully become undetected, you can move normally up to 30 feet before losing the benefits of being hidden.
You can cast Duskwalk times and casting level equal to your Proficiency Bonus, without expending a spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

description.p: You have become Mistborn by the swallowing of a bead of Lerasium:

ul.li: You can burn various metals which alter your physical and mental abilities. This ability is known as Allomancy and its secrets are closely guarded.
You can burn steel 1d8 times (every short rest if you have access to salvageable steel. The steel must be non magical), without expending a spell slot.

sheet.description: You can burn steel 1d8 (every short rest if you have access to salvageable steel. The steel must be non magical) times, without expending a spell slot.
You can burn iron 1d8 (every short rest if you have access to salvageable steel. The steel must be non magical) times, without expending a spell slot.
